title: Xpressdocs Management Shares Innovative Approach To Customizing Branded Marketing Materials on Worldwide Business with kathy ireland
text:
Xpressdocs Management Shares Innovative Approach To Customizing Branded Marketing Materials on Worldwide Business with kathy ireland Tune into Fox Business Network and Bloomberg International as sponsored programming on Sunday, September 13, 2015. September 10, 2015 11:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
LOS ANGELES--( BUSINESS WIRE )--MMP (USA) announces a Worldwide Business with kathy ireland exclusive interview with Darrin Rayner, EVP of Sales and Business Development of Xpressdocs . He explains, “Our firm has grown rapidly by providing innovative solutions to new market realities. We focus on building high-value solutions for enterprises that manage a distributed workforce and require customized and localized marketing materials .” 
Xpressdocs, founded in 2001 and headquartered in Fort Worth, provides an industry leading self-serve, web-based marketing platform for customizing and producing branded marketing materials. The platform has been utilized by hundreds of enterprises and franchises across a variety of industries, including real estate, healthcare, insurance and financial services. Xpressdocs earned the US Postal Service Mail Innovations Award in 2013, and is a member of the Direct Marketing Association and International Franchise Association. 
Rayner concludes with, “Xpressdocs provides the fastest speed-to-market of anyone in our industry, made possible by our online and vertically integrated capabilities that eliminate the expense of inventory and outdated marketing materials. We provide the ability to respond quickly to new market opportunities while ensuring white glove service for each brand we service. In this day of digital marketing, we provide a perfect marriage between new technology and print media.” 
JL Haber, Vice President of Programming for Worldwide Business, observes, “Our viewers rely on us to bring them insights and news on America’s most innovative companies. We’re excited to introduce them to Xpressdocs, and we are confident many of our viewers will find this company offers a valuable service they can and will use.” 
Tune in to see Xpressdocs on Fox Business Network as sponsored programming on Sunday, September 13, 2015 at 5:30pm ET and on Bloomberg International as sponsored programming at 8:30am CET, 3:00pm HKT, and 10:30am CDT. 
About Worldwide Business with kathy ireland 
Worldwide Business with kathy ireland is a weekly business television program featuring real-world insights from corporate executives from all over the globe. 
Worldwide Business with kathy ireland airs Sunday evenings throughout North America on Fox Business Network as part of their sponsored programming lineup and to over 50 countries throughout the world on Bloomberg International as part of their sponsored programming lineup. Contacts
